text: alladhina yattabiʿuna l-rasula l-nabiya l-umiya alladhi yajidunahu maktuban ʿindahum fi l-tawrati wal-injili yamuruhum bil-maʿrufi wayanhahum ʿani l-munkari wayuhillu lahumu l-tayibati wayuharrimu ʿalayhimu l-khabaitha wayadaʿu ʿanhum is'rahum wal-aghlala allati kanat ʿalayhim fa-alladhina amanu bihi waʿazzaruhu wanasaruhu wa-ittabaʿu l-nura alladhi unzila maʿahu ulaika humu l-muf'lihuna
